OUTPUT FORMAT: separate tables per resource type (not flat merged). --show-kind adds kind prefix to NAME column (pod/name, service/name) — NOT a separate KIND column. No flat merge with KIND column is idiomatic kubectl.

LIMIT: no --limit flag. --chunk-size=500 is the pagination chunk (transparent to user). No total count or truncation indicator in output.

SORT: default order is server order (unspecified/arbitrary), NOT alphabetical. --sort-by uses JSONPath (.metadata.name, .metadata.creationTimestamp). Ascending only; no native reverse.

TERMINOLOGY: 'kind' is the object schema term (Pod, Service). Resources = API endpoints. No TYPE/KIND column header by default.

TRUNCATION: no standard indicator. continuation tokens are internal; remainingItemCount unreliable.
